March 

Hot box or Caught box

Several people in a black Honda SUV were reported for smoking a bong in the Lommasson Center parking lot PERIOD UMPD issued a citation to the driver PERIOD

Pippin Tom

The cast of Pippin reported being bothered by a man in the PARTV building during rehearsal PERIOD Officers arrived and custodial locked the building down PERIOD UMPD couldnt locate the man PERIOD

Sand Trapped

A woman was stuck in an outhouse at the UM golf course PERIOD Officers pried the door open and let her out PERIOD

March 

Bleeding Out

A student covered in blood outside Miller Hall was reported to UMPD PERIOD The student cut himself on the glass from a fire extinguisher case leaving a trail of blood through Millers lobby PERIOD

He was taken to St PERIOD Patrick Hospital after officers and an ambulance responded PERIOD UM Police Chief Marty Ludemann said they may not press charges and will follow up with the student on Tuesday PERIOD

Brad Lambert a sophomore living in Miller Hall described the scene as bloody PERIOD It was like when you see someone get an artery cut on television .. PERIOD it was that dark Lambert said PERIOD

See the Kaimins Wednesday edition for the full story

24Hour Notice Not Enough

An RA in Aber Hall reported finding drug paraphernalia in a room after she used her key to open the door PERIOD An officer completed a report PERIOD

March 

Bicker and Bolt

A University Village resident reported their upstairs neighbors were arguing for over  minutes PERIOD The neighbors fled when UMPD arrived PERIOD

College Cooking

The fire alarm in Aber Hall went off after someone overcooked food in their microwave PERIOD The Fire Department reset the alarm PERIOD

March 

OpenDoor Policy

An automated system alerted police to doors being held open in McGill Hall PERIOD UMPD found two people both over  who were drinking in the building after using their Griz Card access to enter PERIOD They were asked to leave PERIOD
